artist: Designer: Mark Morris; Printer: The Philadelphia Reistance Press; Publisher: New Mobilization Center to End the War in Vietnam, Washington, D.C.
creditline: Gift of Michael and Rosalyn Baker
inscription: Printed inscriptions: Mark Morris is written below the flower pot in green. Bottom edge has New Mobilization Committee 1029 Vermont Avenue Northwest, Washington D.C. 20005 printed in green. Small purple logo for the press company in bottom center.
provenance: Michael and Rosalyn Baker, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2003.
title: Anti-Draft Week, March 16-22, 1970
